title: The Lord's Our Rock

author.name: Vernon J. Charlesworth
author.bio: Vernon J. Charlesworth was an English hymn writer and the principal of Charles Spurgeon's Stockwell Orphanage.

lyrics:
The Lord's our rock
In Him we hide
A shelter in the time of storm
Secure whatever ill betide
A shelter in the time of storm.

CHORUS:
Oh, Jesus is a Rock
In a weary land,
A weary land, a weary land
Oh Jesus is a Rock
In a weary land
A shelter in the time of storm.

A shade by day
Defense by night
A shelter in the time of storm
No fears alarm
No foes affright
A shelter in the time of storm.

The raging storms
May round us beat
A shelter in the time of storm
We'll never leave
Our safe retreat
A shelter in the time of storm.

O Rock divine
O refuge dear
A shelter in the time of storm
Be Thou our helper
Ever near
A shelter in the time of storm.
